# Luis Rodriguez

Based in New York City I am a scientist with a background in cancer and immunology research. I have extensive experience spanning Academia and Industry, including Mnemo Therapeutics, Kite Pharma, Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, and Genentech.  My focus across these roles ranges from evaluating CAR-T constructs to conducting in vivo animal studies. I have expertise in a wide array of techniques, from multi-color flow cytometry to genetic manipulation, demonstrating a commitment to advancing our understanding of immunology and cancer biology.
